inputDataWithVowels: The sun shines bright in the sky.
Birds sing songs of joy and love.
Roses bloom in the garden today.
Children laugh and play in the park.
The river flows calmly through the woods.
Clouds drift lazily across the horizon.
Stars twinkle in the night sky above.
The wind whispers secrets through the trees.
Raindrops fall gently on the rooftop.
Moonlight dances on the surface of the lake.
